com.datapak.shopify_java_api.interfaces

Interface TransactionInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionInterfaceImpl

    public interface TransactionInterface
    Allows access to Shopify's Refund Interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jbrown

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transaction captureTransaction(Long order_id)
      Capture a previously authorized order for the full amount
      Transaction captureTransaction(Long order_id, double amount)
      Capture a specified amount on a previously authorized order
      Transaction getTransaction(Long order_id, Long transactionId)
      Retrieve a specific transaction.
      Long getTransactionCount(Long order_id)
      Retrieve count of all a given order's money transfer
      Transaction[] getTransactions(Long order_id)
      Retrieve all money transfers on a given order
      Transaction[] getTransactionsSince(Long order_id, String specified_id)
      Get all money transfers on a given order after specified ID

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactionCount

        Long getTransactionCount(Long order_id)
                  throws ShopifyError
        Retrieve count of all a given order's money transfer
        Parameters:
        order_id - The order Id
        Returns:
        Long object containing a count of all transactions for the order
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order not found or there is some issue.

      • getTransactions

        Transaction[] getTransactions(Long order_id)
                       throws ShopifyError
        Retrieve all money transfers on a given order
        Parameters:
        order_id - The order Id
        Returns:
        Transaction[] containing all transaction for the order
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order not found or there is some issue.

      • captureTransaction

        Transaction captureTransaction(Long order_id)
                        throws ShopifyError
        Capture a previously authorized order for the full amount
        Parameters:
        order_id - The order Id
        Returns:
        Transaction object with captured transaction details
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order not found or there is some issue.

      • captureTransaction

        Transaction captureTransaction(Long order_id,
                               double amount)
                        throws ShopifyError
        Capture a specified amount on a previously authorized order
        Parameters:
        order_id - The order Id
        amount - The amount to capture
        Returns:
        Transaction object with captured transaction details
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order not found or there is some issue.

      • getTransaction

        Transaction getTransaction(Long order_id,
                           Long transactionId)
                    throws ShopifyError
        Retrieve a specific transaction.
        Parameters:
        order_id - The order Id
        transactionId - The id of the transaction
        Returns:
        Transaction object containing transaction details
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order/transaction not found or there is some issue

      • getTransactionsSince

        Transaction[] getTransactionsSince(Long order_id,
                                   String specified_id)
                            throws ShopifyError
        Get all money transfers on a given order after specified ID
        Parameters:
        order_id - = The id of Shopify order
        specified_id - = The specified id
        Returns:
        Transaction[] containing all transactions since specified ID
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order/transaction not found or there is some issue
